methods.name: AddOSMethods
methods.logic: This function is empty. It is intended to add operating system specific methods to the given object template.  However, in this Windows implementation, it does nothing.

methods.name: ReadCharsFromTcpPort
methods.logic: This function is a stub that currently returns nullptr.  It is intended to read characters from a TCP port specified by 'name', and set the size of the read data in 'size_out'.  The comment indicates it's a missing feature on Windows.
